mapper.select: select productNum,productName,productPrice,category from product order by category;
mapper.insert: insert into simple.product(productNum, productName, productPrice, category, subcategory, productImage,productManufacturer,productOrigin) values(#{productNum},#{productName},#{productPrice},#{category},#{subcategory},#{productImage},#{productManufacturer},#{productOrigin});
mapper.delete: delete from simple.product(productNum, productName, productPrice, category, subcategory, productImage,productManufacturer,productOrigin) where productNum = #{productNum};
